sourcesContent:
import { useState, memo } from "react"
import { Button, Drawer, DrawerContent, DrawerOverlay, DrawerHeader, DrawerBody, useDisclosure, Box, Text, List, ListItem, Divider, Link, DrawerCloseButton } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import { RiMenuFoldLine } from "react-icons/ri";

const MenuBar = memo(() => {
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
    const [ isSignedIn, setIsSignedIn ] = useRecoilValue(IsSignedIn)
    return (
        <>
            <Box w='70px' h='70px' cursor='pointer'>
                <Text letterSpacing='1px' fontWeight='600' mb='-5px' fontSize='15px'>MENU</Text>
                <RiMenuFoldLine onClick={onOpen} size='50px' />
            </Box>
            <Drawer placement='right' size='xs' onClose={onClose} isOpen={isOpen} motionPreset='scale'>
                <DrawerOverlay />
                <DrawerContent>
                    <DrawerCloseButton />
                    <DrawerHeader borderBottomWidth="1px">MENU</DrawerHeader>
                    <DrawerBody p='0'>
                        {/* <List> */}
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>新規登録</Link>
                        </Box>
                        <Divider />
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>ログイン</Link>
                        </Box>
                        <Divider />
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>ログアウト</Link>
                        </Box>
                        <Divider />
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>プロフィール</Link>
                        </Box>
                        <Divider />
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>お気に入りアニメ</Link>
                        </Box>
                        {/* </List> */}
                    </DrawerBody>
                </DrawerContent>
            </Drawer>
        </>
    )
})

export default MenuBar
